Articles.Content: i'm not one for joining an online community so i don't relay know what to say but i love this game and want to be involved so here i am lol i haven't played since the free download and just got the game again so any tips on the new updates would be appreciated ty

Hi there sock747 and welcome to the forums - the best way to keep up to date with development is to read the Weekly articles (http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/). If you're looking to learn how the new features work I suggest taking a peek at the Tutorials forum.
Thank you very much for your help
